summary: The diff largely implements the requested UI/UX modernization: new cohesive theme tokens in `index.css` + Tailwind token wiring, modernized header/login/dashboard/tab layouts, and consistent PageHeader/EmptyState + skeleton usage across major tabs. No clearly missing REQ-1/REQ-2 items are evident from the provided diff summary. However, the diff includes additional project metadata/documentation files not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added project metadata/state tracking file not requested as part of UI/UX modernization.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is frontend UI/UX modernization; adding a `project_state.json` file is not mentioned in requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated repository documentation-style summary file not requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for generating or maintaining a file inventory/summary artifact.
